named-query.name: allTutors
named-query.query: select tutor from Tutor as tutor

named-query.name: totalSalary
named-query.query: select sum (tutor.salary) from Tutor as tutor

named-query.name: tutorByIdWithEagerFetchOfStudents
named-query.query: select tutor from Tutor as tutor left join fetch tutor.supervisionGroup where tutor.id = :id

named-query.name: tutorByIdLazy
named-query.query: select tutor from Tutor as tutor where tutor.id = :id
